Player History
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/24/2001 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Boston to San Diego on 7/31/2001 (Going to SDN: P J. Wasdin, P Z. Mcclellan. Going to BOS: P B. Groom)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 3/1/2003 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 8/8/2005 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 89th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2007...
Injured on 5/16/2008 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Released by Chicago (N) on 9/16/2013...
Drafted in 4th round, 88th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2016...
Injured on 7/13/2016 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/21/2017 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Drafted in 4th round, 66th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1977...
Injured on 6/9/1978 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/29/1980...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
